Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Human Rights Profile

ExpressionView.SQL: select D.ID, COALESCE(UNHR_TREATY_BODY_TYPE.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as UNHR_TREATY_BODY_TYPE, D.UNHR_TREATY_BODY_TYPE_ID, CP12.DESIGNATION, CP12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, -1) AS SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN D.HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT_COUNT, COALESCE(D.HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, COALESCE(D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP12UNHRTREATY_BODY D JOIN CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE CP12 ON CP12.ID = D.PARENT_ID JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 ON CP12.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP12.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON CP12.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON CP12.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP12.ENTITY_YEAR LEFT JOIN CATEGORY UNHR_TREATY_BODY_TYPE ON D.UNHR_TREATY_BODY_TYPE_ID=UNHR_TREATY_BODY_TYPE.ID WHERE CP12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

select D.*, CP12.DESIGNATION, CP12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, -1) AS SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN D.UNCT_SUPPORTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UNCT_SUPPORTED_COUNT, COALESCE(D.UNCT_SUPPORTED, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS UNCT_SUPPORTED, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, COALESCE(D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP12VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC D, CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE CP12, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE CP12.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP12.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR AND CP12.ID = D.PARENT_ID AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP12.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 AND CP12.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP12.ENTITY_YEAR

select cp12.ID, cp12.DESIGNATION, cp12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, COALESCE(CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, -1) AS SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR, CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12hranalysis.HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH, CASE WHEN cp12training.PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12training.PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS, CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12hranalysis.HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUPRPROCESS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUPRPROCESS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUPRPROCESS, CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12uprprocess.HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED, CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12uprprocess.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC, CASE WHEN cp12.HASHRI = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASHRI_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HASHRI, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HASHRI, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_CCAUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_CCAUPR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_CCAUPR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_CCAUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_CCA_TREATY_BODIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_CCA_TREATY_BODIES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_CCA_TREATY_BODIES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_CCA_TREATY_BODIES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_CCA_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_CCA_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_CCA_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_CCA_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_UNDAFUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_UNDAFUPR_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_UNDAFUPR, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_UNDAFUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_UNDAF_TREATY_BODIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_UNDAF_TREATY_BODIES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_UNDAF_TREATY_BODIES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_UNDAF_TREATY_BODIES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_UNDAF_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_UNDAF_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, COALESCE(cp12.HAS_UNDAF_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS HAS_UNDAF_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12hrinst.nhri_partners = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as nhri_partners_count, COALESCE(cp12hrinst.nhri_partners, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS nhri_partners,
CASE WHEN cp12.has_disability_inclusion_activities = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_disability_inclusion_activities_count, COALESCE(cp12.has_disability_inclusion_activities, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS has_disability_inclusion_activities, CASE WHEN cp12.has_culture_for_disability_inclusion = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_culture_for_disability_inclusion_count, COALESCE(cp12.has_culture_for_disability_inclusion, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS has_culture_for_disability_inclusion, CASE WHEN cp12.cca_has_analysis_on_indigenous_people = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as cca_has_analysis_on_indigenous_people_count, COALESCE(cp12.cca_has_analysis_on_indigenous_people, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS cca_has_analysis_on_indigenous_people, CASE WHEN cp12.realization_of_indigenous_rights2030 = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as realization_of_indigenous_rights2030_count, COALESCE(cp12.realization_of_indigenous_rights2030, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS realization_of_indigenous_rights2030, CASE WHEN cp12.unct_supported_indigenous_people = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as unct_supported_indigenous_people_count, COALESCE(cp12.unct_supported_indigenous_people, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS unct_supported_indigenous_people, COALESCE(indigenous_people_indicator_presence.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as indigenous_people_indicator_presence, CASE WHEN cp12.cca_has_analysis_on_youth = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as cca_has_analysis_on_youth_count, COALESCE(cp12.cca_has_analysis_on_youth, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS cca_has_analysis_on_youth, CASE WHEN cp12.support_of_youth = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as support_of_youth_count, COALESCE(cp12.support_of_youth, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS support_of_youth, COALESCE(youth_indicator_presence.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') as youth_indicator_presence, CASE WHEN cp12.has_youth_advisory_board = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as has_youth_advisory_board_count, COALESCE(cp12.has_youth_advisory_board, 'X-BOOLEAN') AS has_youth_advisory_board, COALESCE(youth_advisory_board.LABEL, 'X-CATEGORY') AS youth_advisory_board from CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE cp12 JOIN CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1 ON cp12.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp12.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR JOIN CP12TRAINING_ONHRAPPROACH cp12training ON cp12training.PARENT_ID = cp12.id JOIN CP12HRANALYSIS cp12hranalysis ON cp12hranalysis.PARENT_ID = cp12.id JOIN CP12UPRPROCESS cp12uprprocess ON cp12uprprocess.PARENT_ID = cp12.id JOIN cp12hrinstitution_in_country cp12hrinst ON cp12hrinst.PARENT_ID = cp12.id JOIN BASE_COUNTRY bc ON cp12.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 JOIN v_cp_validated_designations v ON cp12.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp12.ENTITY_YEAR LEFT JOIN CATEGORY indigenous_people_indicator_presence ON cp12.indigenous_people_indicator_presence_id=indigenous_people_indicator_presence.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY youth_indicator_presence ON cp12.youth_indicator_presence_id=youth_indicator_presence.ID LEFT JOIN CATEGORY youth_advisory_board ON cp12.youth_advisory_board_id=youth_advisory_board.ID WHERE cp12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO'

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT
Dimension.caption: Has UNCT engaged in developing national capacity?

Dimension.name: HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS
Dimension.caption: Has UNCT facilitated recommendations by the Gov?

Dimension.name: UNHR_TREATY_BODY_TYPE
Dimension.caption: UN HR Treaty Body

MeasureGroup.name: CP Human Rights Treaty Bodies Measures

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Human Rights Treaty Bodies

Measure.name: hasEngagedDevelopNatlCapacityToReport
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT engaged in developing national capacity

Measure.name: hasFacilitatedFollowupRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT facilitated recommendations by the Gov

Cube.name: Special Procedure of Human Rights Council
Cube.caption: Special Procedure of Human Rights Council

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: Name
Dimension.caption: Name of special procedure

Dimension.name: UNCT_SUPPORTED
Dimension.caption: Has UNCT support this visit?

Dimension.name: HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS
Dimension.caption: Has UNCT facilitate recommendations by the Gov?

MeasureGroup.name: CP Special Procedure of Human Rights Council

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Special Procedure of HRC

Measure.name: unctSupported
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT support this visit

Measure.name: hasFacilitatedFollowupRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT facilitate recommendations by the Gov

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have a designated person or group to advise it on human rights matters?

Dimension.name: HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH
Dimension.caption: Has a training on Human Rights-Based Approach been conducted over the past year?

Dimension.name: PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS
Dimension.caption: Was it undertaken as part of the UNDAF/Cooperation Framework rollout process?

Dimension.name: HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS
Dimension.caption: Has a human rights analysis taken place over the past year?

Dimension.name: HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR
Dimension.caption: Has a strategy been developed to address the human rights issues identified in the analysis?

Dimension.name: HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES
Dimension.caption: Has action been taken to address the human rights issues identified in the human rights analysis?

Dimension.name: HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the government in mainstreaming human rights into national development policies and programmes?

Dimension.name: HASUPRPROCESS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT engaged in the preparation, reporting or follow-up of the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) this year?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT submitted a UNCT report to the UPR?

Dimension.name: HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the UPR recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and/or advocacy strategies?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the government in developing a report for the UPR in the past year?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported civil society in developing inputs or reports for the UPR in the past year?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the National Human Rights Institution in developing inputs or reports for the UPR in the past year?

Dimension.name: HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT engaged with one or more UN human rights treaty bodies in the past year (preparation, review, or follow-up)?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the human rights treaty body recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT drawn on the human rights treaty body recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT submitted inputs/reports to human rights treaty bodies?

Dimension.name: WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY
Dimension.caption: Was the country reviewed by a treaty body this year?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations of the Special Procedures to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?

Dimension.name: HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC
Dimension.caption: Did the country receive a visit of a Special Procedure (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) of the Human Rights Council in the last year?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT
Dimension.caption: Did the UNCT facilitate follow up of the recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN
Dimension.caption: Did the UNCT engage with the government on facilitating visits by Special Procedures (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) this year (preparation, visit, follow-up)?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the government in preparing for the visits of Special Procedures?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported civil society interact with the Special Procedure?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution interact with the Special Procedures?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT provided inputs to the visit of the Special Procedures?

Dimension.name: HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the Special Procedures recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: HASHRI
Dimension.caption: Is there a National Human Rights Institution (NHRI) in the country?

Dimension.name: HAS_CCAUPR
Dimension.caption: Does the current CCA include the recommendations from the UPR as a core component of its analysis?

Dimension.name: HAS_CCA_TREATY_BODIES
Dimension.caption: Does the current CCA include the recommendations from the treaty bodies as a core component of its analysis?

Dimension.name: HAS_CCA_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES
Dimension.caption: Does the current CCA include the recommendations from the special procedures as a core component of its analysis?

Dimension.name: HAS_UNDAFUPR
Dimension.caption: Does the current UNDAF link outcomes with specific recommendations from the UPR?

Dimension.name: HAS_UNDAF_TREATY_BODIES
Dimension.caption: Does the current UNDAF link outcomes with specific recommendations from the treaty bodies?

Dimension.name: HAS_UNDAF_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES
Dimension.caption: Does the current UNDAF link outcomes with specific recommendations from the special procedures?

Dimension.name: nhri_partners
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT engaged with the NHRI as a partner?

Dimension.name: has_disability_inclusion_activities
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT implemented activities on disability inclusion in the past year (eg. advocacy, programming, UN analysis, engaging with Organisations of Persons with Disabilities)?

Dimension.name: has_culture_for_disability_inclusion
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT undertaken any steps to strengthen organizational culture in relation to disability inclusion in the past year (e.g. capacity development, awareness-raising, internal or external communication, employment of persons with disabilities)?

Dimension.name: cca_has_analysis_on_indigenous_people
Dimension.caption: Does the CCA contain a situational analysis on indigenous people?

Dimension.name: realization_of_indigenous_rights2030
Dimension.caption: Does your current UNDAF/Cooperation Framework support/address the realization of indigenous peoplesâ€™ rights as part of the implementation of the 2030 Agenda?

Dimension.name: unct_supported_indigenous_people
Dimension.caption: In the past year, has your UNCT supported the participation of indigenous peoples in UN and national development processes?

Dimension.name: cca_has_analysis_on_youth
Dimension.caption: Does the CCA contains a youth situational analysis?

Dimension.name: support_of_youth
Dimension.caption: Does the current UNDAF/Cooperation Framework support/address the needs, builds the agency, and advances the rights of the young people?

Dimension.name: has_youth_advisory_board
Dimension.caption: Does your UNCT have a youth advisory board(s) or equivalent to provide input on UN work?

Dimension.name: indigenous_people_indicator_presence
Dimension.caption: Does your UNDAF/Cooperation Framework has specific indicators on indigenous people?

Dimension.name: youth_indicator_presence
Dimension.caption: Does your UNDAF/Cooperation Framework have youth-specific indicators

Dimension.name: youth_advisory_board
Dimension.caption: Are the youth advisory boards agency-specific or joint boards across UN entities?

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Country Records Submitted

Measure.name: UNCTHumanRightsAdvisor
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT Human Rights Advisor

Measure.name: HumanRightsBasedApproach
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has a training on Human Rights-Based Approach been conducted over the past year?'

Measure.name: partOfRolloutProcess
Measure.caption: Count of 'Was it undertaken as part of the UNDAF/Cooperation Framework rollout process?'

Measure.name: HumanRightsAnalysis
Measure.caption: Count of human rights analysis taken place over the past year

Measure.name: HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has a strategy been developed to address the human rights issues identified in the analysis?'

Measure.name: hasAddressedHRIssues
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has action been taken to address the human rights issues identified in the human rights analysis?'

Measure.name: UNCTSupported
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT supported the government in mainstreaming human rights into national development policies and programmes

Measure.name: UPR
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT engaged with the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) process this year

Measure.name: hasUNCTReportUPRSubmitted
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT submitted a UNCT report to the UPR?'

Measure.name: hasFacilitatedFolloupGovRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the UPR recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedGovernmentUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported the government in developing a report for the UPR in the past year?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedCivilSocietyUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported civil society in developing inputs or reports for the UPR in the past year?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedNationalHumanRightsInstitutionUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported the National Human Rights Institution in developing inputs or reports for the UPR in the past year?'

Measure.name: UNHumanRightsTreatyBodies
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT engaged with one or more UN human rights treaty bodies in the past year

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedCivilSocietyDevelopInputs
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedNationalHumaRightsInstitution
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSubmittedInputsReports
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT submitted inputs/reports to human rights treaty bodies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTFacilitatedFollowUpRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the human rights treaty body recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSDrawnOnRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT drawn on the human rights treaty body recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?'

Measure.name: wasCountryReviewedByTreatyBody
Measure.caption: Count of 'Was the country reviewed by a treaty body this year?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations of the Special Procedures to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTFacilitateFollowUpGovernment
Measure.caption: Count of 'Did the UNCT facilitate follow up of the recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: ReceiveVisitSpecialProcedure
Measure.caption: Count of country receive a visit of a Special Procedure (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) of the Human Rights Council in the last year

Measure.name: hasUNCTEngageWithGovernmen
Measure.caption: Count of 'Did the UNCT engage with the government on facilitating visits by Special Procedures (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) this year (preparation, visit, follow-up)?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedGovernmentSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported the government in preparing for the visits of Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedCivilSocietySpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported civil society interact with the Special Procedure?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTDSupportedNationalHumanRightsInstitution
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution interact with the Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTProvidedInputsSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT provided inputs to the visit of the Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTFacilitatedGollowUpSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the Special Procedures recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: NHRI
Measure.caption: Count of National Human Rights Institution (NHRI)

Measure.name: CCAUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the current CCA include the recommendations from the UPR as a core component of its analysis?'

Measure.name: CCATB
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the current CCA include the recommendations from the treaty bodies as a core component of its analysis?'

Measure.name: CCASP
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the current CCA include the recommendations from the special procedures as a core component of its analysis?'

Measure.name: UNDAFUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the current UNDAF link outcomes with specific recommendations from the UPR?'

Measure.name: UNDAFTB
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the current UNDAF link outcomes with specific recommendations from the treaty bodies?'

Measure.name: UNDAFSP
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the current UNDAF link outcomes with specific recommendations from the special procedures?'

Measure.name: nhriPartners
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT engaged with the NHRI as a partner?'

Measure.name: hasDisabilityInclusionActivities
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT implemented activities on disability inclusion in the past year (eg. advocacy, programming, UN analysis, engaging with Organisations of Persons with Disabilities)?'

Measure.name: hasCultureForDisabilityInclusion
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT undertaken any steps to strengthen organizational culture in relation to disability inclusion in the past year (e.g. capacity development, awareness-raising, internal or external communication, employment of persons with disabilities)?'

Measure.name: ccaHasAnalysisOnIndigenousPeople
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the CCA contain a situational analysis on indigenous people?'

Measure.name: realizationOfIndigenousRights2030
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does your current UNDAF/Cooperation Framework support/address the realization of indigenous peoplesâ€™ rights as part of the implementation of the 2030 Agenda?'

Measure.name: unctSupportedIndigenousPeople
Measure.caption: Count of 'In the past year, has your UNCT supported the participation of indigenous peoples in UN and national development processes?'

Measure.name: ccaHasAnalysisOnYouth
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the CCA contains a youth situational analysis?'

Measure.name: supportOfYouth
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the current UNDAF/Cooperation Framework support/address the needs, builds the agency, and advances the rights of the young people?'

Measure.name: hasYouthAdvisoryBoard
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does your UNCT have a youth advisory board(s) or equivalent to provide input on UN work?'
